job_title: SRE(Site Reliability Engineer) with Azure EXp
jd: Hi , This is Srikanth from iTech US. I have below requirement with one of the premier Client. Please go through it and let me if you are interested to apply for same. Role: SRE(Site Reliability Engineer) with Azure EXpLocation: San Jose, CA(Hybrid) - PST CandidatesVisa: Only H1B with PPNum MandatoryNote: Please don't send Devops/ Cloud Engineer profilesJob Description:Total IT Experience 10 YearsDatabricks Admin, JIRA, Tableau, Tuna Web, KubernetesBI Data Visualization - Tableau, ADLS, Tera Form/Biceps, DevOps Tools, Azure resources, VNet, Traffic manager, Databricks, Python, Scala, JIRA, Tableau, Tuna Web, scripting.Debugging the data pipelinesExperience in monitoring the alerts and troubleshooting the issues using Grafana, Azure Metrics, Kusto Functions and LogicAppsFamiliarity with the Azure Cloud ecosystem using AZ firewall, Traffic manager, VNet Experience in performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. Defining and setting development, test, release, update, and support processes for DevOps operation.Incidence management and root cause analysis Deploy updates and fixes, and provide Level 2/L3 technical support Experience in ticketing processing using JIRA, ADO Excellent communication abilities in English communication skill, in written and oral.
